text: int main ( ) { int t , n , i , j , k , d ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] , c = 0 ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ j ] ) ; } for ( j = 0 ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { d = 0 ; for ( k = j ; k < n ; k ++ ) { if ( a [ k + 1 ] >= a [ k ] ) { d ++ ; continue ; } else { c += d ; break ; } } } c = c + n ; printf ( "%d\n" , c ) ; } }
